title: Gameday: Verify when game is in 'Warmup' all tabs in gameday view are tappable and have no game data recorded
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the scoreboard page
And the particular game is in 'Warmup'
custom_steps: When the user taps the blue button next to the applicable game
custom_expected:
Then they are taken to the Gameday view where The Gameday(if available for team), Field, Box Score and Summary tabs are all active and tapable
And tapping on each tab takes the user to the correct view
But none of the tabs have any game data recorded yet.

title: Gameday: Verify Game appears as 'Live' on scoreboard and in all tabs
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Scoreboard page
custom_steps: When the game goes into a live state
custom_expected:
Then the user should see the game go into a live state on the scoreboard
And the gameday button should appear
And in the gameday view the game should appear as live with all tabs accessible(Gameday button only appears for some teams)

title: Gameday: Verify pitching counts are appearing correctly in all tabs and on scoreboard
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the scoreboard page
custom_steps: When the game is in progress and updating
custom_expected: Then the user should see the pitch counts appearing correctly on the scoreboard and in the Gameday view.

title: Gameday: Verify the app handles basepad occupation correctly on scoreboard and in gameday
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the scoreboard page
custom_steps: When players are occupying the bases
custom_expected:
Then this should be accurately reflected on:

1) The Scoreboard page:
 a)On the bases in the game cell
 b)On the bases in the expanded drawer
2) In the Gameday view(If Gameday button exists for team):
 a) On the bases in the Scoreboard

title: Gameday: Verify innings are updating correctly in all tabs of gameday
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the Gameday view
custom_steps: When the game is ongoing
custom_expected: Then the innings should be updating correctly across all tabs

title: Gameday: Scoreboard: Put the game in a delayed start - verify correct behavior
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the scoreboard page
custom_steps: When a game is put into a delayed start state
custom_expected: Then the scoreboard will show the delay but the Gameday Preview icon will still appear on the scoreboard and the use will not be able to access Gameday or other tabs

title: Gameday: Scoreboard: Verify Mid and End of innings is updating correctly on scoreboard
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the scoreboard page
custom_steps: When the game is in progress and any half inning has been completed
custom_expected: Then the half inning should be reflected on the scoreboard, it should show "Mid" as well as "End" of innings

title: Gameday: Scoreboard: Verify Game appears as 'Warmup' on scoreboard page
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Scoreboard page
custom_steps: When the game goes into Warmup state
custom_expected: Then the user will see the correct state appear on the scoreboard page

title: Gameday: Preview view: Verify Team logos, game time, stadium, etc all appear correctly
custom_preconds: Given the game has not started
custom_steps: When the user taps the Preview link from the scoreboard
custom_expected: Then the user is taken to the Game Preview view and they can see the team logos, game time, stadium and other relevant info appear correctly

title: Gameday: Gameday view: Verify 'Warmup' appears within Gameday view
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the Scoreboard page
And the game is in a Warmup state
custom_steps: When the user taps the blue tab next to the game on the scoreboard
custom_expected: Then they are taken to the Gameday view and 'Warmup' should appear within the view.

title: Gameday: Gameday view: Verify lineups appear correctly, correct starting pitcher and batter
custom_preconds: Given the game is in warmup state
custom_steps: When the user taps the gameday button
custom_expected: Then the correct batter and pitcher are shown

title: Gameday: Gameday view: Verify all hit types appear correctly ie single, double, triple, etc
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Gameday tab of the Gameday view(If team has Gameday tab available)
custom_steps: When any hit appears, (Single, Double Triple, etc)
custom_expected: Then it should appear correctly in the pitch by pitch in the bottom half of the window

title: Gameday: Gameday view: Verify stolen bases update correctly
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Gameday tab of the Gameday view
custom_steps: When a stolen base occurs or is entered
custom_expected: Then the Stolen base should update correctly and be reflected in the pitch by pitch, the play should also be reflected on the basepad indicator

title: Gameday: Gameday view: Verify player names appear correctly and are readable
custom_preconds: Given the user is on Gameday Tab of the Gameday view(If game has Gameday tab available)
custom_expected: Then the player's names should appear correctly and be readable

title: Gameday: Gameday view: Verify pitch by pitch is functioning correctly (strikes - red, ball - green, in play - blue)
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Gameday tab of the Gameday view
custom_steps: When a pitch appears
custom_expected: Then the color of the pitch should be correctly reflected (Strikes - Red, Balls - Green, In Play - Blue)

title: Gameday: Gameday view: Verify batter is on the appropriate side for his hitting preference
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Gameday tab of the Gameday view
custom_steps: When a batter appears in the view
custom_expected: Then the batter should appear on the appropriate side of the plate based on their hitting preference

title: Gameday: Gameday Tab: When there is no pitch by pitch - Tab is visible but should be grayed out
custom_preconds:
Given that the app is installed
And there is no pitch by pitch for a particular game
custom_steps: When the user taps the game day button on the scoreboard or team page, or the more info button on the scoreboard
custom_expected: Then they will be taken to the Gameday view but the Gameday tab will not be present

title: Gameday: Gameday Tab: When there is pitch by pitch - Player names should appear correctly and be readable
custom_preconds: Given there is a game available with pitch by pitch
custom_steps: When the user taps the Gameday button in the scoreboard or team page
custom_expected: Then they should be taken to the Gameday tab(If team has Gameday button) of the Gameday view, Pitcher and Batter's names should appear correctly and be clearly readable

title: Gameday: Gameday Tab: When there is pitch by pitch - Tab should update live according to fetch settings
custom_preconds:
Given there is a game with pitch by pitch available
And the user is in the Gameday tab view of Gameday
custom_expected: Then the info in this tab should update according to fetch settings

title: Gameday: Gameday Tab: When there is pitch by pitch - Pitches should display correctly
custom_preconds:
Given there is a game with pitch by pitch available
And the user is in the Gameday tab view of Gameday
custom_steps: When the game is updating
custom_expected: Then the pitches should display correctly

title: Gameday: Gameday Tab: When there is pitch by pitch - Verify new batters update correctly per batting preference of player
custom_preconds:
Given there is a game with pitch by pitch available
And the user is in the Gameday tab view of Gameday
custom_steps: When the batter changes
custom_expected: Then the new batter should update correctly and their batting preference should be reflected correctly

title: Gameday:  Boxscore Tab: Tab should be selectable and appear correctly Player names should appear correctly and be readable
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the Gameday view
custom_steps: When the user taps the Box Score tab
custom_expected: Then they should be taken to the Box Score Tab and Player names should appear clearly and be readable

title: Gameday:  Boxscore Tab: Tab should update live according to fetch settings with correct inning/scores/batter
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the Box Score tab in the Gameday view
Given there is a game in progress
custom_expected: Then the Tab should update live according to fetch settings with correct Inning, Score and Batter

title: Gameday:  Boxscore Tab: Should be able to toggle between home and away lineups
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Box Score tab in the Gameday view
custom_steps: When the user taps the Home and Away tabs at the top of the page
custom_expected: Then the lineups should switch for the appropriate team, tapping back and forth should not cause any issues

title: Gameday:  Boxscore Tab: Should be able to scroll between innings when gameplay is extended beyond 9 innings
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the Box Score tab in the Gameday view
And the game is extended beyond 9 innings
custom_steps: When the user attempts to scroll the linescore at the top of the page
custom_expected: Then the innings should scroll without a problem, the user should be able to see all the innings without issue

title: Gameday:  Boxscore Tab: Player names should be selectable and should open corresponding player cards
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Box Score tab in the Gameday view
custom_steps: When the user taps a player name
custom_expected: Then the Player card should be opened

title: Gameday: Field Tab: Stadium name should read correctly
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Field tab in the Gameday view
custom_expected: Then the stadium name should appear in the top bar, it should appear correctly and be readable

title: Gameday: Field Tab: Field graphic is visible and accurate
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Field tab in the Gameday view
custom_expected: Then the Field graphic should be visible and accurate

title: Gameday: Field Tab: Tab should be selectable and appear correctly
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the Gameday view
custom_steps: When the user Taps the Field button
custom_expected: The Field tab should open

title: Gameday: Field Tab: Player names should appear correctly and be readable
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Field tab in the Gameday view
custom_expected: Then the Player's names should be readable and appear correctly

title: Gameday: Field Tab: Tab should update live according to fetch settings
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Field tab in the Gameday view
custom_steps: When the game is ongoing
custom_expected: Then the user should see the Field tab update live according to the fetch settings

title: Gameday: Summary Tab: Tab should be selectable and appear correctly
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the Gameday view
custom_steps: When the user taps the Summary tab
custom_expected: Then the user should  be taken to the Summary view, the tab should appear correctly and be selectable

title: Gameday: Summary Tab: Tab should update live according to fetch settings
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the Summary tab in the Gameday view
And there is a game ongoing
custom_expected: Then the Summary tab should update live about every 15 seconds

title: Gameday: Summary Tab: Plays should update accurately and be readable
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Summary tab in the Gameday view
custom_steps: When a play occurs
custom_expected: Then the user should see the plays update accurately and be readable

title: Gameday: Summary Tab: Should be able to toggle between innings
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Summary tab in the Gameday view
custom_steps: When the user taps and inning on the right side of the screen
custom_expected: Then the view shift to the Summary for that inning

title: Gameday: Summary Tab: Should be able to toggle between plays/scoring plays
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Summary tab in the Gameday view
custom_steps: When the user taps either the Plays or Scoring tabs at the top of the page
custom_expected: Then the appropriate view should appear, toggling back and forth should not cause any problem

title: Gameday: Summary Tab: Scoring plays in summary should be in bold blue text
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Summary tab in the Gameday view
custom_steps: When a scoring play appears
custom_expected: Then it should appear in blue and be in bolded text

title: Gameday: Summary Tab: Delays in game should appear in gray font with a grayscale box
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Summary tab in the Gameday view
custom_steps: When a game delay appears in the summary
custom_expected: Then it should appear in gray font, with a grayscale box

title: Gameday: Summary Tab: Plays should be in bold black text in white box
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Summary tab in the Gameday view
custom_steps: When a regular play appears in the Summary
custom_expected: Then it should appear in bold black text in a white box

title: Gameday: Summary Tab: Summary should show change in top and bottom of inning in Plays list
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Summary Tab in the Gameday view
custom_steps: When an inning change occurs
custom_expected: Then it should be reflected in the Plays list

title: Scoreboard: Delayed State: Verify delayed game is sorted properly in the scoreboard according to the sorting rules
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the scoreboard page
custom_steps: When there is a game that is delayed
custom_expected: Then the game appears at the top of the list with all other in progress games

title: Scoreboard: Delayed State: Verify all tabs within gameday are clickable and are no longer updating with post delay data
Scoreboard: Delayed State: Verify Game appears as 'Delayed' or 'Del' on scoreboard and in all tabs
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: When the game goes into or is put into a Delayed state
custom_expected: Then that state is indicated on the scoreboard and on all the tabs within the Gameday view

title: Scoreboard: Delayed State: Verify all possible delayed game states function properly (rain, snow, etc)
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the scoreboard view
custom_steps: When the game is put into any type of delay, Rain, Snow, Ceremony, etc
custom_expected: Then if should reflect the delayed state without issue

title: Scoreboard: Postponed State: Verify Game appears as 'Postponed' or 'Post' on scoreboard and in all tabs
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the scoreboard page
custom_steps: When there is a game that is postponed
custom_expected: Then the game should appear as postponed on the scoreboard and in all the Gameday tabs, the Gameday preview should appear in lieu of Gameday recap

title: Scoreboard: Postponed State: Verify all possible postponed game states function properly (rain, snow, etc)
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the scoreboard view
custom_steps: When the game is put into any type of postponement, Rain, Snow, Tragedy, etc
custom_expected: Then if should reflect the Postponed state without issue

title: Scoreboard: Postponed State: Verify postponed game is sorted properly in the scoreboard according to the sorting rules
custom_preconds: Given that the user is on the scoreboard page
custom_steps: When there is a game that is postponed
custom_expected: Then the game should move to the bottom of the list with the rest of the games as if it has been completed

title: Scoreboard: Suspended State: Verify Game appears as 'Suspended' or 'Susp' on scoreboard and in all tabs
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the scoreboard page
custom_steps: When there is a game that is suspended
custom_expected: Then the game should appear as suspended on the scoreboard and in all the Gameday tabs

title: Scoreboard: Suspended State: Verify all possible delayed game states function properly (rain, snow, etc)
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the scoreboard view
custom_steps: When the game is put into any type of suspension, Rain, Snow, Tragedy, etc
custom_expected: Then if should reflect the suspended state without issue

title: Scoreboard: Suspended State: Verify suspended game is sorted properly in the scoreboard according to the sorting rules
custom_preconds: Given that the user is on the scoreboard page
custom_steps: When there is a game that is suspended
custom_expected: Then the game should move to the bottom of the list past the games that are in progress or are still scheduled to be played

title: Scoreboard: Suspended State: Verify all tabs within gameday are clickable and are no longer updating with post delay data
Scoreboard: Final State: Verify Game appears as 'Final' on scoreboard and in all tabs
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the scoreboard page
custom_steps: When there is a game that has gone final
custom_expected: Then the game should appear as final on the scoreboard and in all the Gameday tabs, the Gameday Wrap page should appear in place of Gameday tab

title: Scoreboard: Final State: Verify a game that ends early appears correctly on all tabs (in both mid inning and completion of inning)
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the scoreboard page
custom_steps: When there is a game that ends before 9 innings (in mid inning or after completion of inning)
custom_expected: Then the game should appear and act as Final game

title: Scoreboard: Final State: Verify a game that ends normally appears correctly on all tabs (in both mid inning and complete innings)
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the scoreboard page
custom_steps: When a game has completed
custom_expected: Then it should appear as a Final game on the Scoreboard and on all tabs in Gameday

title: Scoreboard: Final State: Verify a game that ends with extended innings appears correctly on all tabs (in both mid inning and complete innings)
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the scoreboard page
custom_steps: When a game has completed in extra innings
custom_expected: Then it should appear as a Final game and it should be indicated that the game went more than 9 innings, (eg. Final/12)

title: Scoreboard: Final State: Final without pitch by pitch - verify these games appear correctly
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the scoreboard page
And there is a game that did not have pitch by pitch
custom_steps: When the game has been completed
custom_expected: Verify that the game appears correctly as Final and there are no inconsistencies with other games that have gone final

title: Scoreboard: Final State: Final game with pitch by pitch - verify these games appear correctly
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the scoreboard page
And there is a game that has pitch by pitch
custom_steps: When the game has been completed
custom_expected: Then the game should appear as a Final game

title: Scoreboard: Final State: Gameday tab should show Game Wrap with winning and losing pitchers, etc
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the scoreboard page
And there is a game that has been completed
custom_steps: When the user taps the Gameday button or the inning button
custom_expected: Then they should be directed to the Game Wrap page that has the winning and losing pitchers as well as other relevant game information

title: Scoreboard: Final State: All other tabs should remain clickable after game is in Final state
custom_preconds:
Given that the user is in the Gameday view
And the game the user is looking at has gone final
custom_steps: When the user taps any of the tabs on the bottom navigation
custom_expected: Then they should be taken to the tab they selected, all tabs should remain tappable and should have latest data even once game goes into Final
